availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Churchill Blackburn loser (Kenton County, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Elenor Blackburn. Father of James Blackburn, Mary Blackburn, and Edward Blackburn. Physician in Kenton County in 1860. Served as surgeon in the 41st Regiment Kentucky Infantry from September 4, 1862 to October 4, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, p. 661.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky: Confederate Kentucky Volunteers War 1861-65, vol. 1 (Frankfort: Legislature of Kentucky, 1915), pp. 442, 860.
